description:
Technical and streamlined, the Aenergy 20-25 is down with your fast and light missions. Equipped for high alpine environments, it features a stowable helmet flap, loops for ice axes and a dedicated compartment for avalanche equipment. Rear panel access and a speed ski attachment keeps crucial gear organized and easy to grab. Drawing inspiration from trail running vests, its carrying system ensures the load stays close to your body, preventing unnecessary bouncing.

  • Main fabric is made with durable nylon with a PFC-free DWR finish for weather resistance
  • CONTACT™ frame with high density EVA back panel and shoulder straps for a comfortable carry
  • Rolltop closure with zipper lets you expand the pack for an extra 5l of volume
  • Front compression strap can be removed and worn as a hip belt
  • Rear access to the main compartment puts everything right at your fingertips
  • Dedicated front pocket for avalanche safety equipment
  • Large mesh shoulder strap pockets for a soft bottle or snacks
  • Attachments for ice axe and trekking poles
  • Integrated helmet carrier
  • Speed ski attachment allows for fast transitions
  • Daisy chain loop to secure additional gear
  • Front compression strap can be removed and used as a hip belt
  • Rope attachment on flap
  • Internal hydration sleeve lets you add your own reservoir. (sold separately)
name: Mammut Aenergy ST 20-25 Daypack - Unisex
